column1: #Text=Bush says US troop build-up in Iraq has brought ' hope '
#Text=President George W. Bush says the so-called " surge " strategy in Iraq is working .

#Text=The President was speaking in Kuwait during one of several stops on a tour of the Middle East to build support for his administration 's efforts to stabilize Iraq and to contain Iran ' s growing influence in the region .
#Text=President Bush said the United States ' change of strategy in Iraq has sharply reduced violence there and should allow the military to withdraw 20,000 troops on schedule by July this year .
#Text=After meeting with his top military commander in Iraq , General David Petraeus , and U.S. Ambassador to Iraq Ryan Crocker , Mr. Bush told reporters that hope is returning to Baghdad .
#Text=The president said he has made no decision on withdrawing more troops from Iraq .
#Text=He said that will depend on recommendations by General Petraeus , who is due to report to Congress on that issue in March .
#Text=A day earlier , the president told the NBC television network that U.S. troops could remain in Iraq for at least a decade .
#Text=Mr. Bush also called on Syria to cut what he called " the flow of terrorists " into Iraq .

column1: #Text=He accused Iran of supporting militias and extremist groups in Iraq , and urged it to stop .
#Text=Later , the president addressed a crowd of some 1,500 American troops at a U.S. military base in Kuwait .

#Text=The history will say , it was when you were called upon , you served , and the service you rendered was absolutely necessary to defeat an enemy overseas so we do not have to face them here at home ,  he said .

#Text=Mr. Bush said the troops were part of what he called  an ideological struggle " against " cold-blooded murderers " with a " hateful vision of a future .

_	_	_	_

#Text=In his speech Bush said  Iraq is now a different place from one year ago , " and that " we [ Americans ] must do all we can to ensure that 2008 will bring even greater progress "

column1: #Text=He said the best way to defeat an ideology of hate is with an ideology of hope , based on liberty .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=There is no doubt in my mind that we will succeed ,  he said .

_	_	_	_
